message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.DL, cs.DB. 

The paper proposes a personalized recommendation system for academic research papers. The system uses web crawling to retrieve research papers and defines similarity between papers based on text similarity. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the Information Retrieval (cs.IR) sub-category, which deals with search and recommendation systems. Additionally, the paper uses collaborative filtering methods to develop the recommendation system, which is a common technique in Machine Learning (cs.LG), Natural Language Processing (cs.CL), Deep Learning (cs.DL), and Database (cs.DB) sub-categories. Therefore, these five sub-categories are the most likely ones for this paper.
